bibl.title: Literary Fashions and the Transmission of Texts in the Graeco-Roman World.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Center for Hermeneutical Studies in Hellenistic and Modern Culture (Graduate Theological Union and the University of California, Berkeley). Protocol of Colloquy. 19 (1976) pp. 1-8. - Relates certain features of the transmission of the New Testament to that of Classical texts, using the papyrological evidence.

bibl.title: G.D. KILPATRICK, The Principles and Practice of New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays

bibl.seg: KILPATRICK G.D., Literary Fashions and the Transmission of Texts in the Graeco-Roman World.

Reproduit de: Center for Hermeneutical Studies in Hellenistic and Modern Culture (Graduate Theological Union and the University of California, Berkeley). Protocol of Colloquy. 19 (1976) pp. 1-8. - Relates certain features of the transmission of the New Testament to that of Classical texts, using the papyrological evidence.
